full_text: 1 Haley, how could you do this? Blah, blah, blah. And then Haley's like, okay, I won't do it again. And like she just kind of like hung up and he was like I hate her, I hate her and then I hate you too. And I was like okay and we broke up and then I think (inaudible) on the computer and I think he told Sheena what happened and she turned it into an extraordinary, like story so at school so I would look like, you know, like I'm the bad person, like I'm a slut, I'm a whore or something and she's going around school saying all this stuff and then so my parents came, cause that's when I got mad at her and told her to stop talking but she wouldn't stop talking about it. So I just got in a fight with her, like a fist fight at school. And I got suspended and so did she but she only got suspended for one day because he started the fight. So I got in trouble more. And my dad got really mad and he grounded me for it, because he found the $300 in my wallet and then my dad was like, you're grounded, you're grounded forever and he's all freaking out, how could you do this, blah, blah. The school said you did. And um, I didn't tell the school how, I told them I got it from my job, cause I worked at Chick Filet but I quit. So I said I (inaudible) but nobody believed me so I was just like believe what you want. Cause I didn't want to tell the principal or my parents. MP: Well, I think that the best thing that you're doing is that you're being honest. Okay? Um hm. MP: You already know that they have a pretty good idea what happened. Okay? I didn't even know there was like an investigation. Page 29 of 43 Page 44 of 81 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031136
